title: Claire Danes enjoys a parents' night out with husband Hugh Dancy
text:
They have their hands full raising two children.

But Claire Danes enjoyed a rare red carpet outing with her husband Hugh Dancy on Monday night.

The actress, 40, and her husband, 44, got all dressed up to attend the opening night of the play Seared at the MCC Theater in New York.

Parents' night out! Claire Danes enjoyed a rare red carpet outing with her husband Hugh Dancy on Monday night

It's not often the couple are seen together on the red carpet, so undoubtedly the pair were happy to enjoy some time together.

Claire exuded elegance in a long black coat, which was slightly contrasted by her more playful, textured jumpsuit.

The Romeo & Juliet actress teamed the all-black outfit with a matching pair of chunky heels while carrying a glittering polka dot purse.

She also wore her silky blonde hair down with a touch of red lipstick.

Keeping it classy: Claire teamed her elegant black coat with a textured jumpsuit

Night off: Hugh seemed to be in good spirits as he enjoyed a night of keeping the spark alive alongside his wife

Hugh, meanwhile, looked absolute suave in a blue grey blazer worn over a button down shirt and smart slacks.

He finished off the look with a slicked back hair style.

Hugh seemed to be in good spirits as he enjoyed a night of keeping the spark alive alongside his wife.

The busy actors have been married for ten years and are parents to sons Cyrus, six, and Rowan, one.

Fit and fabulous! Claire was spotted going for a run in New York's West Village on Tuesday

The couple first met playing love interests on the set of the 2006 drama, Evening.

In addition to her family life, Claire has been busy starring in the hit Showtime series Homeland.

The show will return for it's eighth and final series on February 9 after nine years on air.
